content.heckinviv.mutatedGoblin.blurb: The goblin-curse has twisted your body and racked your mind. Food. Eat. Bite. There’s yet a glimmer of you shining in your beady little eyes. Hunger. Need. Bite. Sure, you’re a feral killing machine who’s motivated by the most debased and cruel intentions, but have you met the other members of your party? Kill. Blood. Bite!
content.heckinviv.mutatedGoblin.strangeP: A strange potion you drank, made by an odd alchemist not far from Galgenbeck. See The Goblin Grinder.
content.heckinviv.mutatedGoblin.demonicG: Attacked by a demonic goblin said to have crawled out of hell itself from a pit in Graven-Tosk. See The Devil’s Tomb.
content.heckinviv.mutatedGoblin.goblinRo: A prick from a mutated goblin-rose that sits dried next to a love letter addressed to somewhere in the Wastland. See Murder, Blues, and Her on my Mind.
content.heckinviv.mutatedGoblin.undeadGo: Bitten by an ancient crusty undead-goblin with the tattoos of a Cretun monk. See The Death Ziggurat.
content.heckinviv.mutatedGoblin.serpentG: It all started after the strange dreams of a slumbering serpent god. See The Forsaken God.
content.heckinviv.mutatedGoblin.bornLike: You were born like this, you’ve always been an odd-goblin, you grew up near a weird old noble’s tomb in the Valley of Unfortunate Dead. See Vault of the Unseen.
content.heckinviv.mutatedGoblin.wretched: You are illiterate, but you can treat scrolls as rations. You can only speak in garbled single words.
content.heckinviv.mutatedGoblin.impotent: You do not pass along your goblin-curse. Nevertheless, people despise you. Reduce Reaction tests by 2.
content.heckinviv.mutatedGoblin.warpedBo: Your ropy skin is tier 1 armor (-d2), and you need 2 rations a day or starve. Your bite is a d4 weapon.
content.heckinviv.mutatedGoblin.oddMutat: You may be an emaciated murder monster, cursed forever to hunger for flesh and blood, but at least this mutated body comes with a perk or two. The first time you Get Better, gain a second mutation.
content.heckinviv.mutatedGoblin.awfulAug: Anytime you hear a lie, you get a truly miserable stomach ache. Roll DR 8 Presence or attack the miserable liar.
content.heckinviv.mutatedGoblin.crustyCu: Your bite requires a DR 12 Toughness test, or the target is Infected. If they die with this infection it is raised as a goblin d4 hours later.
content.heckinviv.mutatedGoblin.extraneo: Grow a tertiary eye in a strange place. You can see from it when you pluck it from your body for d4 hours. It grows back in d4 days.
content.heckinviv.mutatedGoblin.fidgetyF: Roll Agility for ranged attacks, your bite, and one-handed weapons.
content.heckinviv.mutatedGoblin.rockyRot: Your stony skin is tier 2 armor (-d4) with no Agility penalty. When curled up you are indistinguishable from a large boulder the size of a small boulder.
content.heckinviv.mutatedGoblin.degenera: Any time you regain HP you gain 1 more. Regrow lost limbs in d4 days. Your limbs can be treated as rations.
content.heckinviv.mutatedGoblin.sharksSh: Your bite is d8, and you can make arrows out of the teeth that fall out of your mouth, gather d8 teeth daily.
content.heckinviv.mutatedGoblin.viciousV: The skin on your face peels back to reveal a haunting grimace of blood, sinew, and far too many teeth. Why would teeth even grow *there!?!* You can pull back your face and shriek to make companions and enemies to roll morale.
